### Simulation constants

Number of simulations
```{r sims, echo = TRUE, include = TRUE}
library(stepwiser)
sims <- 10
sims
```

Stepwise algorithm
```{r directions, echo = TRUE, include = TRUE}
## Can be any subset of c("backward", "forward", "both")
directions <- "backward"
directions
```

Coefficients
```{r betas}
betas <- c(1, 2, 3, -1, -2, -3)
#betas <- 2
betas

```

Sample sizes

```{r sample-size}
n_values <- c(30, 60, 90, 300, 600, 900, 3000, 6000, 9000)
n_values <- c(30, 60, 90, 300, 600, 900)
n_values

```

from $\rho_{X_{i}X_{j}}$

```{r correlation}
rho_values <- c(0, sqrt(0.4), sqrt(0.8))
rho_values <- c(0, sqrt(0.1), sqrt(0.2), sqrt(0.4), sqrt(0.8))
rho_values

```
Candidate predictor variables
```{r predictive-variables}
predictors <- c(12, 18, 24, 50, 100)
predictors

```

$\alpha$
```{r alpha}
MFWER <- 0.15

alpha_values <- c(0.15, 1 - (1 - MFWER)^(1 / predictors), 0.05)
alpha_values

```

```{r reproduce-simulation}
sim_object <- dk_sim(sims = sims, directions = "backward", betas, n_values, rho_values, alpha_values, predictors, rnorm, 0, 0.2)

```

```{r plot-data, echo = TRUE, results = "asis", include=TRUE}
sim_df <- sim_object_to_df(sim_object)
sim_df_alpha_015 <- sim_df[sim_df$alpha == 0.15, ]
ggplot2::ggplot(data = sim_df, mapping = aes())
